page.title: 12PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: Frant is on a hill just south of Tunbridge Wells it has its own church, two pubs, the village shop also a hairdressers and a restaurant. There is a bowls club, a cricket club, a childrens play area it has a train station down in the next village Bells Yew Green. Many different activities go on in the village hall. LOCAL NEWS In the autumn of 1984 the Frant hill road suffered a series of bad accidents when people found out that the road surface had been surfaced with the wrong material.
